title: NO salary cut for Public Sector – Finance Ministry
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ministry of Finance noted that there is NO decision to reduce the salaries of public sector employees.
The Secretary to the Ministry of Finance, Mahinda Siriwardena said that the Ministry of Finance had instructed that steps be taken to slash the expenditure of state institutions.
A special circular was issued to all Secretaries to the Ministries and Heads of Government Institutions on Tuesday (26).
Accordingly, it has been informed that all projects that are scheduled to implement, should be temporarily suspended.
